arts.ttl: Newcastle beat Forest to keep pressure on Postegoclou
arts.sum: Ange Postecoglou's winless start at Nottingham Forest continues, as Nick Woltemade and Bruno Guimaraes fire Newcastle United to victory at St James' Park.

arts.ttl: "I love a challenge": Postecoglou claims Forest task is not a burden" despite Newcastle defeat
arts.sum: Head coach Ange Postecoglou insists that he is relishing the challenge of improving Nottingham Forest despite Sunday's 2-0 defeat to Newcastle United making it seven games without success.

arts.ttl: Pressure piles on Ange as Forest lose at Newcastle
arts.sum: Newcastle United became the latest team to get the better of Ange Postegoclou's Nottingham Forest as they registered a 2-0 win at St. James' Park.

arts.ttl: Pressure mounts on Ange Postecoglou as wait for first Forest win goes on
arts.sum: Newcastle 2-0 Nottingham Forest: Bruno Guimaraes and Nick Woltemade were on target for the hosts
